jobs.job_description: Join Boeing's software engineering team. Experience with Java, Python, and aerospace software development required. Knowledge of real-time systems and embedded software a plus.

Analyze healthcare data to improve patient outcomes. Experience with machine learning, Python, R, and healthcare analytics required. Knowledge of pharmaceutical data a plus.
